name: Thrill Mountain
description:
THRILLS, SPILLS AND ICE CREAM COVERED HILLS AWAIT!

Your Mission: Roll your way to AWESOMENESS in this fast-paced race to the bottom of Thrill Mountain.

Roll and bounce your way through mountains of pasta and tomato sauce. Fly off insane ramps and avoid meatballs and other ridiculous obstacles! Collect stars with tilt-controlled action that would give even the most serious player an appetite for fun!

•Test your reflexes!
•Collect stars to earn medals!
•6 amazing Zings to choose from!
•Zany tracks inspired by the art of Amazing World!
•Test your reflexes!
•Satisfy your NEED FOR SPEED!

Are you up to the challenge?
